author: kfogel
msg: If multiple updates or merges caused repeated property conflicts on
(say) the current directory, the 'dir_conflicts.prej' file would list
each conflict, but without newlines separating them.  The resulting
file was very hard to read.

author: sussman
msg: * doc/book/book/ch07.xml: a bunch of typo & grammar fixes.

author: kfogel
msg: Merge r8235 into 1.0, remove it from STATUS:
Fixes the erroneous username prompt if store-auth-creds=no.

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix the tmpdir problem that prevented running svnlook from a
(do_diff): Use create_unique_tmpdir. Remove the directory on

author: kfogel
msg: * STATUS: Move some Perl changes into the approved section.  I'll be
